problem_text_cn: 如图,用矩形ABCD纸片裁一扇形ABE,围成圆锥侧面．若AB=16,则此圆锥底面半径为()
problem_text_en: As shown in the figure, use a rectangular ABCD paper to cut a sector ABE and enclose it on the lateral surface of a cone. If AB = N_0, then the radius of the bottom surface of the cone is ()
raw_answer: 解:设圆锥的底面圆半径为r,依题意,得2πr=\frac{90π×16}{180},解得r=4．故圆锥的底面半径为4；故选:A．
